name: Dont Let the turkey get cold!
name_original: Dont Let the turkey get cold!
description: A game about not letting the turkey get cold. Grab the logs and put them in the fire to keep the fire going as long as you can! If the fire goes out, your dinner will get cold. This was made within 2 days for the XMAS Game jam, This is our second game ever so please let us know what you think, and where we can improve!
